description: This file is a C++ source file containing mock implementations of socket-related system calls for testing purposes, referencing an external mock object and providing function hooks such as socket(), connect(), send(), select(), recv(), and close().

methods.name: int socket(int domain,int type,int protocol)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the socket() system call, delegating to g_socketMock if available.

methods.name: int connect(int sockfd,const struct sockaddr * addr,socklen_t addrlen)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the connect() system call, delegating to g_socketMock if available.

methods.name: ssize_t send(int sockfd,const void * buf,size_t len,int flags)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the send() system call, delegating to g_socketMock if available.

methods.name: int select(int nfds,fd_set * readfds,fd_set * writefds,fd_set * exceptfds,struct timeval * timeout)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the select() system call, delegating to g_socketMock if available.

methods.name: ssize_t recv(int sockfd,void * buf,size_t len,int flags)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the recv() system call, delegating to g_socketMock if available.

methods.name: int close(int sockfd)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the close() system call, delegating to g_socketMock if available.

ctags.name: connect
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int connect(int sockfd, const struct sockaddr* addr, socklen_t addrlen)$/

ctags.name: recv
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" ssize_t recv(int sockfd, void *buf, size_t len, int flags)$/

ctags.name: select
ctags.signature: (int nfds,fd_set * readfds,fd_set * writefds,fd_set * exceptfds,struct timeval * timeout)

ctags.name: send
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" ssize_t send(int sockfd, const void *buf, size_t len, int flags)$/

ctags.name: socket
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int socket(int domain, int type, int protocol)$/
